result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: I was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ga: bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.orig: bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.html: bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo ḋroim niṁneaċ ó ẛinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.

result.eng: What happened then?
result.ga: cad a tharla ansin
result.orig: cad a tharla ansin
result.html: cad a tharla ansinWhat happened then?
result.ponchtml: cad a ṫarla ansinWhat happened then?

result.eng: You must stay at home then.
result.ga: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.orig: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sin
result.html: caithfidh tú fanacht sa bhaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ tú fanaċt sa ḃaile mar sinYou must stay at home then.

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ga: is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.orig: is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.html: is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ponchtml: is fearr linn fanaċt i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.

result.eng: Things have changed since then.
result.ga: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shin
result.orig: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shin
result.html: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shinThings have changed since then.
result.ponchtml: tá cúrsaí aṫraiṫe ó ẛinThings have changed since then.

result.eng: I've had a limp since then.
result.ga: tá mé bacach ó shin
result.orig: tá mé bacach ó shin
result.html: tá mé bacach ó shinI've had a limp since then.
result.ponchtml: tá mé bacaċ ó ẛinI've had a limp since then.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: You know everybody, then?
result.ga: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.orig: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.html: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?
result.ponchtml: tá aiṫne agat ar gaċ éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?

result.eng: You will be an aunt, then.
result.ga: beidh tú i d'aintín mar sin
result.orig: beidh tú i d'aintín mar sin
result.html: beidh tú i d'aintín mar sinYou will be an aunt, then.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ tú i d'aintín mar sinYou will be an aunt, then.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: sin Úna sin niaṁ ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: There are three of you in the house, then.
result.ga: triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.orig: triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sin
result.html: triúr agaibh atá sa teach mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.
result.ponchtml: triúr agaiḃ atá sa teaċ mar sinThere are three of you in the house, then.

result.eng: There are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.
result.ga: tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansin
result.orig: tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansin
result.html: tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansinThere are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna maiṫe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansinThere are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.orig: más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.html: más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ponchtml: más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an ṁaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.

result.eng: We are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ga: is ionann cás dúinn mar sin táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.orig: is ionann cás dúinn mar sin táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.html: is ionann cás dúinn mar sin táimid nasctha tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ponchtml: is ionann cás dúinn mar sin táimid nascṫa tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i nua-eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: Then he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ga: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.orig: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.html: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ponchtml: ansin smaoiniġ sé naċ raiḃ sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
